mapper.select: select vendor_name from ma2000 where vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=CHAR} and (SELECT C.sp_value FROM CM9060 C WHERE C.sp_id = '0000') BETWEEN ma2000.effective_start_date AND ma2000.effective_end_date

select distinct -- ma2000.vendor_id,ma2000.vendor_name ma2000.vendor_id k,CONCAT(ma2000.vendor_id,' ',ma2000.vendor_name) v from ma2000
and (lower(ma2000.vendor_id) like '%'|| lower(#{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' or lower(ma2000.vendor_name) like '%'|| lower(#{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
order by ma2000.vendor_id desc
